job_description:
Our client is a is a global healthcare technology company that specializes in developing innovative solutions for the community care market, enhancing the quality of life for patients and families, and reducing the cost of care delivery. They are currently seeking to hire a Senior Software Engineer. The role is fully remote and the individual can be based anywhere in Canada willing to work in EST.

What Will You Do
Leading and mentoring a team of developers, overseeing their output and ensuring the quality of their work.
Collaborating with stakeholders to understand and translate business needs into technical requirements.
Designing, coding, and debugging applications. Performing software analysis, code analysis, requirements analysis, software review, and system risk analysis.
Developing and directing software system testing procedures, programming, and documentation.
Actively learning new technologies, programming languages, and development techniques to enhance your skills and contribute effectively to the development of the team.
Keeping abreast of new technology developments and integrating them into future software project designs.
What Will You Bring
Degree/diploma in Computer Science or equivalent hands-on work experience.
8+ years of experience in software development.
Fundamental skills: Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Tech Stack: Experience with AWS, Nestjs, Typescript, Vue 3, Jest, PostgreSQL, FHIR, Jenkins, and some java knowledge is beneficial, but not required.
Experience leading a team of developers and managing large scale software projects.
Excellent communication skills, leadership abilities, and a strong work ethic.
